item.title: Another Life
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.md#i-see-pain-i-see-need-vyl-wnanory|As I lay here lying on my bed]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.md#i-see-pain-i-see-need-vyl-wnanory|Sweet voices come into my head.]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.md#i-see-pain-i-see-need-vyl-wnanory|Oh what it is, I want to know]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/no_more_sorrow.

item.title: Drifter
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/hybrid_theory/a_place_for_my_head.md#stay-away-vyl-wnanory|Walk away!]] Â [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#darkness-comforts-me-in-this-moment-vyl-wnanory|Look out now, baby won’t you take me away,]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#darkness-comforts-me-in-this-moment-vyl-wnanory|Sittin’ here its gonna be a new day.

item.title: Innocent Exile
item.description: [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/sowing_season_yeah.md#is-it-in-you-now-vyl-wnanory|My life is so empty, nothing to live for.]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/sowing_season_yeah.md#is-it-in-you-now-vyl-wnanory|My mind is all confusion, ‘cos I defied the law.]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/sowing_season_yeah.

item.title: Killers
item.description: [[songs/a/alaska_highway/closure/skyline.md#the-lights-above-us-vyl-wnanory|You walk through the subway, his eyes burn a hole in your back,]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/closure/skyline.md#the-lights-above-us-vyl-wnanory|A footstep behind you, he lunges prepared for attack.

item.title: Murders in the Rue Morgue
item.description: [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#follow-the-roses-down-into-the-depths-vyl-wnanory|I remember it as plain as day]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#follow-the-roses-down-into-the-depths-vyl-wnanory|Although it happened in the dark of the night.]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#follow-the-roses-down-into-the-depths-vyl-wnanory|I was strolling through the streets of Paris]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.

item.title: Prodigal Son
item.description: [[songs/a/as_i_lay_dying/awakened/resilience.md#i-can-only-hope-that-ill-have-gained-the-courage-vyl-wnanory|Listen to me Lamia, listen to what I’ve got to say.]] [[songs/a/as_i_lay_dying/awakened/resilience.md#i-can-only-hope-that-ill-have-gained-the-courage-vyl-wnanory|I’ve got these feelings, and they won’t go away.

item.title: Purgatory
item.description: [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#you-found-me-in-this-i-found-you-a-rose–of-death-vyl-wnanory|Thinking of an age old dream,]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#you-found-me-in-this-i-found-you-a-rose–of-death-vyl-wnanory|Places I have never seen,]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#you-found-me-in-this-i-found-you-a-rose–of-death-vyl-wnanory|Fantasies lived times before.]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/attitudes_of_a_difficult_mind/darkness_in_my_eyes.md#you-found-me-in-this-i-found-you-a-rose–of-death-vyl-wnanory|I split my brain, melt through the floor.

item.title: Twilight Zone
item.description: [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/bury_me_at_makeout_creek/pillow_talk.md#dead-alive-vyl-wnanory|She lays in bed at night and that is when I make my call.]] [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/bury_me_at_makeout_creek/pillow_talk.md#dead-alive-vyl-wnanory|But when she stares at me, she can’t see nothing at all,]] [[songs/t/the_killing_tree/bury_me_at_makeout_creek/pillow_talk.

item.title: Wrathchild
item.description: [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/this_cold_black.md#mother-nature-is-a-coward-mother-nature-is-a-whore-vyl-wnanory|I was born into a scene of angriness and greed, and dominance and persecution.]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/this_cold_black.md#mother-nature-is-a-coward-mother-nature-is-a-whore-vyl-wnanory|My mother was a queen, my dad I’ve never seen, I was never meant to be.
